Differentiation.pl

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #
00002 #  Example of how to add new functionality to the Parser.
00003 #  
00004 #  Here we load new methods for the Parser object classes.  Note, however,
00005 #  that these are PERSISTANT when used with webwork2 (mod_perl), and so we
00006 #  need to take care not to load them more than once.  We look for the
00007 #  variable $Parser::Differentiation::loaded, which is defined in the
00008 #  differentiation package, in order to tell.
00009 #  
00010 #  DifferentiationDefs.pl is really just a copy of the
00011 #  Parser::Differentiation.pm file, and you really could just preload the
00012 #  latter instead by uncommenting the 'use Parser::Differentiation' line at
00013 #  the bottom of Parser.pm.  (This file is really just a sample).  The way
00014 #  it's done here will load it the first time it gets used, then will keep
00015 #  it around, so not much overhead even this way.
00016 #
00017 
00018 loadMacros("DifferentiationDefs.pl") unless $Parser::Differentiation::loaded;
00019 
00020 1;
